div.p:
Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem tercio
die mensis februarij anno quo supra

The saide day it was deliuerit be ane Suorne assis'
Robert blinsele forspekar' that Williame moir' sale freithe
and releyf henry Crage of xxij s' s' and iiij d' scottis money
of annuell bigan And' atour he sale haue the forbutht for
xvj s' of maile and viij d' for' ane yer' to freithe the
said' annuell at the handis of Williame blinsele

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio Sexto die februarij
anno quo supra

Eodem die Johannes Culane deuenit plegius legalis quod thomas
Scot erit Indempnis pro Jacobo Wricht aliter quam per viam Juris
et Idem Jacobus obligatur releuare eundem Johannem de huiusmodi
fideiussione

The saide day it was deliuerit be ane suorne assis' Johne
colisone forspekar that gif thomas barde preuis sufficientlie
befor the aldirman and balyeis of the burghe within xl dais
that he bocht vij barrellis of ays' fra thomas nory
than the said' thomas nory has done wrang to him And'
gif he falyeis in his preyf he has done wrang to the said'
thomas nory Item Robert blinsele come Souerte for thomas
nory to pay the ays' and the expens' Ande Jonhne culan Souerte
be his hand' for the saide thomas barde to pay the ays'
ande the expens' gif he beis fundin in the wrange

Eodem die Johannes fechat conuictus per assisam pro perturbio thome
Scot Idem thomas conuictus pro perturbio ipsius Johannis vxor
dicti Johannis amerciatur pro perturbio vxoris ipsius thome Et
econuersio Ipsa conuicta pro perturbio eiusdem vxoris Et quilibet alteri
emendabit ut Jura volunt Idem Johannes dabit vnam
libram cere ad lumen Sancti Sanguinis Et sibi dicti thomas
et sua sponsa conuicti fuerunt In postrum expellentur de burgo

Curia balliuorum legalis burgi de Abirdene tenta
in pretorio eiusdem decimo die mensis februarij anno quo supra

the saide day thome quhit tuk to preyf Jonhne Ste
vinsone pait of x s' of maile Sene he deliuerit his
pundis to philp Dunbrek one monunday that next cumis

The saide day thome quhit grantit him avand' to Jok
blabir xvj s' Scottis money to be pait within terme of
law

The saide day philp Dunbrek sergeand' at commavnde of the
aldirman and balyeis arrestit demi barrel of Salmond' in the handis
of Jonhne colisone pertening to thomas fyf to the frethin
of the balyeis at the handis of thome menyeis for the
said' thomas fyffis dett

div.head:
Assisa ad Inquisicionem margarete
Kintor
div.p:
Johannes Colisone thomas prat Johannes Wormet thomas
mar Willelmus blinsele Alexander gray Alexander mar' Willelmus
futhes Robertus rede Andreas murray Willelmus gareache
Willelmus portar Robertus Crage Dauid' spens et Johannes
Stewin Jurati dicunt quod quondam Richardus Kintore
auus margarete Kintor latricis presencium obiit vltimo vestitus
et sasitus de feodo ad pacem et fidem domini nostri Regis
de quadam terra anteriore cum suis pertinenciis Jacente infra dictum burgum
in vico furcarum ex orientali parte eiusdem vici inter terram
quondam thome de Camera ex australi ex vna et terram
quondam Walteri pyot ex boreali partibus ab altera Et quod dicta
margareta est vna de legittimis et propinquioribus heredibus
quondam dicti auj suj de predicta terra et quod est legittime etatis
et quod valet per annum xl s' et tantum valuit tempore pacis Et quod tenetur in capite de Suppremo domino nostro
Rege per seruicium burgagium Et nunc existit in manibus
domini nostri Regis per Sexdecim annos aut eocirca in defectu
veri heredis Jus suum minime prosequentis

Eodem die Andreas Culane senior legittime vocatus respondere
plegio super eum porrecto per Andream murray seniorem pro
iniusta detencione ab eo summe Octo marcarum et non compar
uit Igitur precipitur Andree nachty seriando ad capiendum districtum
ab eodem et Iterum ad plegium dimitti si petatur Et ad premu
niendum ipsum ad feriam terciam videlicet in crastinum post festum
Sancti mathei Apostoli proximo futuro tanquam quarto die huius
processus

The saide day Jonhne of tuliboy was fundin quyt of
aucht merkis vsuale money of Scotland' be ane suorne
assis' thomas mar' forspekar follouit and clamit be Johne
Sanclar' for mariage gudis promittit to him for
Ande the saide Jonhne Sanclar' was in Amerciament of the court
for the wranguys borghe' strekin' apone the said' Jhone
of tuliboy et cetera

The saide day It was deliuerit be ane Suorne assis'
Williame blinsele forspekar that forsy Dauison' sale content and
pay to Jonhne Stewin be cayrsonday that next cumis
xxxtj s' Scottis becaus' he Intromettit with the office of clerschip
Ande he sale tak the bill and pas' amang the personis that
ar' awand' it and gathir' In

The said' day Williame gareauche eldar was quyt of the
challance of Jonhne Stewin of the saide xxxtj s'

Eodem die Alexander stabillar et vxor sua conuicti per assisam
pro perturbio Willelmi buchane quibus emendabunt
vt iura volunt

Eodem die Ebota honysone sponsa et relicta quondam Roberti
Kintore coram preposito et balliuis huius burgi et assisa predicta
electa et Jurata de et super deseruicione breuis margarete
Kintor et ostendit in medio produxit et presente perlegi fecit
vnam litteram testimonialem in pergamentum scriptum manu discreti
viri domini Roberti leis notarij publici Sigillo Roberti blinsele
tunc ballivi Sigillat' proportan' continen' et exprimen'
dictam Ebotam legittimam veram et Indubitatam sasinam
et possessionem terre Interioris quondam dicti Roberti coniugis suj
secum in coniuncta infeodacione haben' pro tempore vite sue
Jacen' infra dictum burgum in vico furcarum ex orientali parte
eiusdem vici inter terram quondam thome de Camera ex australi
et terram quondam Walteri pyot ex boreali et terram anteriorem
eiusdem tenementi versus occidens extenden' in longitudine
ad communionem viam regiam versus oriens

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio eiusdem xiiijto
die februarij anno quo supra

The saide day Jonhne Waus in futy grantit to pay to
Alexander menyeis betuix this and pasche alsmekle' siluer
for ane caipstok as the saide Alexander preuis be suorne
personis befor the balyeis that the saide caipstok was
worthte

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem
xvij die februarij anno quo supra

Eodem die Alexander gluttere in Amerciamento Curie per proprie lingue confessionem
pro fractione assise et Statute dicti burgi pinsendo panem
Et similiter pro pinsione pistura panis de farrina Insufficiencia
et emendabit ut iura volunt

Eodem die Willelmus moir' senior conuictus per assisam ex ore Alexandri de
Camera in Schipraw pro perturbio henrici Crag Et similiter
Idem Willelmus amerciatur pro perturbio Richardi baxtar quibus emendabit
ut iura volunt

head.add: the Settis of the buthtis vndir the tolbutht and fleshous

div.p:
The saide day diuers' of the consale and communite present for
the tyme grantit for the commone profit of the tone and for
the reformacion of the tolbutht g to the aldirman pouer
to Sett thar merchandis buthtis and fleshous' vndir the tolbutht
and erast to tham that has thame in tak gif thai wile gif for
thame alsmekile' as vthiris will gif and gif thai wile nocht
gif for thame als'mekile as vthiris will to Sett thame
for the common' profit

Alexander menyeis Robert blinsele Jonhne of Culane Jonhne
Colisone thomas prat Jonhne Wormet Williame blinsele
thomas mar Androw murray eldar Jonhne menyeis William
futhes Androw murray yongar William gareauche eldar John blak
Jonhne moir' Williame andirson eldar and Alexander nachty quhilkis
Suorne the gret bodely aithez' deponit and declarit that
thai wyst neuire nay persone hawe avay ony stanys he
win nor vhewin of the castall excep the gray freris

xxij die februarij anno quo supra Johannes Culane deuenit plegius
legalis quod Willekin Alexander angosone Junior et suj marinj
et seruitores in nauibus suis existentes erunt Indempnes
pro Andrea Waus Adam Culane Alexandro Culan rolland' Johanne mat
land' et suis marinis in naui sua existentibus aliter quam per viam
Juris Et ad intrandum dictas personas coram preposito et ballivis
in pretorio de abirdene xxv die dicti mensis instantis Juri subeundem
Et thomas prat deuenit plegius legalis quod Idem Johannes
Culane et certe persone prescripte erunt Indempnes pro dictis
Willekin Alexandro angosone et suis seruitoribus ac marinis aliter
quam per viam iuris Et ad intrandum huiusmodi personas dicto die
Juri subeundum Insuper Willelmus Kintor deuenit plegium legalem
quod predicti Willekin Alexander et suj marinj ut premittur erunt In
dempnes pro Johanne Culan et parte sua aliter quam per viam iuris Et quilibet
dictarum parcium obligatur ad conseruandum suos plegios Indempnis
de huiusmodi fideiussione per manus et bona

Eodem die thomas prat Intrauit Willekin Alexandrum angosone
et suos seruientes marinos Juri subeundum prout obligatus fuit
et asseruit ipsum exoneratum et se exonerauit de omni plegio
legali dictarum personarum

Eodem die prepositus et balliuj thomam prat exonerare recu
sarunt de huiusmodi plegio legali sed plegium astrictum ut Jura
volunt pro dictis personis affirmarunt

Eodem die clays copin et freys' teutonici conuictus pro pertur
bio Alexandri rolland' et Andree Waus et hij conuicti de perturbio
suo et cetera et soluet tres li' cere in dominica proxima ad lumen Sancti
Sanguinis

Eodem die diliberatum fuit per assisam ex ore roberti blinsele quod
si aliquis dictorum teutonicorum conuictus fuerit per perturbio dictorum
Andree alexandri aut alicuius ipsorum Soluet quinque marcas ad
fabricam ecclesie beati nicholaij Et similiter si aliquis familiaris
Johannis Culane antedicti conuictus fuerit pro perturbio dictorum
teutonicorum Soluet quinque marcas ad fabricam dicti
operis

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio eiusdem vltimo die fe
bruarij anno quo supra

the saide day Jonhne of lammyntone was
conuikit be ane Suorne assis' Robert blinsele forspekar for
the strubulance of Androw Culane yongar bailye in ane fensit
court and to Amende as law wile and forber' in tym to cum

Curia balliuorum legalis tenta in pretorio eiusdem tercio die
marcij anno quo supra

the saide day the aldirman and balyeis assignit
this day xv dais to Dauid gichtan to ansuer to the borghe' strekit
one him be Androu mureson' for the wranguis' haldin fra him
of thre scoir' crovnis Scottis

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio eiusdem vijo die
mensis marcij anno quo supra

the samyn day the aldirman and balyeis chargit philp of Dunbrek
officiar to lok the tolbutht dur' apone thome quhit becaus'
he was chargit to remane within the tolbutht obefor be the officiaris
quhile he pait x s' to Jonhne Steuinsone and passit furtht
but leyf of the officiaris

The saide day thomas Scot conuikit be ane Suorne assis'
be the moutht of Williame blinsele for the forstallinge of the burghe'
In byinge of Skinnis Ande als' for the regratinge In tappin
of bonatis and vthiris penny worthis et cetera

the samyn day the aldirman balyeis Consale and communite present for the
tyme gravntit thame avand' to Alexander nachty tua markis scottis
money resauit in waxe to our Souerane lordis propine quhilkis
thai oblist thame to allow in the saide Alexanderis girssome gif the
said' assedacion of the tone' beis maid' within ij yeris Ande gif
the saide assedacion be nocht maid' within the saide tua yeris than
thai oblist thame to pay and refund' the saide tua merkis agan
to the saide Alexander but fraude and gile And' thankit him of
the first of the saide money

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio eiusdem decimo die
marcij anno quo supra

The saide day Jonhne gilespy Jonhne matlande and Jonhne scherar'
suorne the gret aithe deponit that the caipstok that Jonhne Waus Intro
mettit with pertening to Alexander menyeis was wortht x s'
